Interface AnimalList

public interface AnimalList
Provides the structure for which to create a list of multiple animals, which can grow and change in size.
Version:
01/31/2024
Author:
Jackson Eshbaugh

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(Animal animal)
    Appends an animal to the end of the list.
    int
    find(Animal animal)
    Finds the specified animal in the list, and returns its index.
    void
    remove(int i)
    Removes an animal from the list by its index.
    void
    remove(Animal animal)
    Searches the list for animal and removes it from the list, if found.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(Animal animal)
      Appends an animal to the end of the list.
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal object to add to the list

    • remove

      void remove(Animal animal)
      Searches the list for animal and removes it from the list, if found.
      Parameters:
      animal - the Animal to remove from the list.

    • remove

      void remove(int i)
      Removes an animal from the list by its index.
      Parameters:
      i - the index to remove from the list

    • find

      int find(Animal animal)
      Finds the specified animal in the list, and returns its index.
      Parameters:
      animal - the Animal to find in the list.
      Returns:
      the index of animal or -1 if animal was not found.
